name: Pompa (Firework Simulator)
description:
Hello there,

this is a firework simulation made by me in a week. It´s pretty basic, but I like how it turned out. Try it out for yourselves

CONTROLS:

WASD = Movement

Mouse = Look around

Left-Mouse-Button = Pick-Up Rocket / Place Rocket / Drop Rocket

F = Activate/Interact

R = Activate all rockets at once
